stories.title: US details alleged secret Chinese nuclear test, urges disarmament talksPublished16 minutes agoWashington presented declassified seismic evidence of a 2020 underground test at China's Lop Nur site. Beijing called the accusation "completely unfounded."41 sources
Trump taps Pentagon AI to set prices for critical minerals40 sources
House to vote on aircraft locator bill after Pentagon pulls support39 sources
Russia warns US nuclear testing would trigger 'domino effect'44 sources

Meta signs 6-gigawatt AI chip deal with AMDPublished3 hours agoAMD issued Meta a warrant for up to 160 million shares, with vesting tied to shipment milestones across a multi-year GPU deployment.45 sources

Iran nears deal to buy supersonic missiles from ChinaPublished4 hours agoReuters reports Iran is close to purchasing CM-302 anti-ship cruise missiles from China as the U.S. masses naval forces near Iranian waters.41 sources
Oil tanker costs hit 6-year high as US-Iran war fears mount64 sources
NASA delays Artemis II rollback to Wednesday due to weather35 sources
Asian markets split as AI fears, new tariffs rattle investors68 sources

MIT study rules out wildfires, volcanoes as cause of recent surface warmingPublished8 hours agoResearchers isolated temperature effects of three major natural events and found none explain the acceleration of global warming at Earth's surface.58 sources

Trump's global tariff takes effect at 10%, not 15% as announcedPublished8 hours agoConfusion over the tariff rate underscores the uncertainty businesses face as the administration scrambles to rebuild its trade regime after the Supreme Court struck down IEEPA-based duties.75 sources
Explosion near Moscow train station kills police officer on Ukraine war anniversary42 sources
Venezuela frees nearly 2,200 under new amnesty law43 sources
Slovakia cuts emergency power to Ukraine over oil dispute54 sources

2026 is deadliest start to a year for Mediterranean migrants, UN saysPublished15 hours agoAt least 606 migrants have died or gone missing crossing the Mediterranean since January, the IOM said, as rescuers search for 30 people off Crete.34 sources

Ukraine reconstruction costs hit $588B as war marks four yearsPublished12 hours agoA new World Bank assessment found direct damage rose 11% in the past year, with energy infrastructure destruction surging 21%.53 sources
Trump weighs new national security tariffs on six industries88 sources
Maryland sues to block ICE detention center near Williamsport34 sources
Anthropic says Chinese AI labs used 24,000 fake accounts to copy Claude61 sources

Trump dismisses Pentagon warnings about Iran strike risksPublished17 hours agoThe president called reports of his top general's caution "100% incorrect," saying any conflict would be "easily won."39 sources

Anthropic proposes theory for why AI chatbots act human-likePublished9 minutes agoThe company says AI assistants develop human traits not just from programming but from simulating characters learned during pre-training.48 sources
Study finds ChatGPT Health missed over half of emergencies in triage test51 sources
Cook, Huang, Su got secret CIA briefing on China-Taiwan threat61 sources
Anthropic launches new Claude Cowork plugins for HR, banking, and design87 sources

Anthropic unveils Intuit, DocuSign, and other deals at enterprise AI eventPublished24 minutes agoThe company announced partnerships to embed finance, legal, and contract tools into its Claude Cowork platform as it competes with OpenAI for business customers.91 sources

Musk accuses Anthropic of 'stealing training data' after its claims against Chinese AI labsPublished29 minutes agoThe attack came after Anthropic alleged three Chinese firms ran "industrial-scale" distillation campaigns using 16 million Claude queries.41 sources
Microsoft launches sovereign cloud for fully offline AI and productivity30 sources
Waymo launches robotaxis in 4 new cities, doubling to 10 U.S. markets63 sources
L3Harris says it cut hypersonic engine production time tenfold with 3D printing37 sources

AI chip startup MatX raises $500M to take on NvidiaPublished1 hour agoFounded by ex-Google TPU engineers, the startup is now valued at several billion dollars as it builds processors designed exclusively for large language models.65 sources

MIT report exposes hidden human labor behind humanoid robotsPublished3 hours agoAn investigation reveals that robots marketed as autonomous still rely on remote teleoperators and low-wage workers to function.96 sources
CrowdStrike reports 89% surge in AI-powered cyberattacks49 sources
Anthropic CEO compares AI's rapid advance to a tsunami society is ignoring47 sources
Court filings show Meta exec called encryption plan 'so irresponsible'40 sources

Nvidia reports earnings amid booming Gulf chip exportsPublished4 hours agoThe AI chipmaker is set to release fiscal Q4 results on Feb. 25 as UAE and Saudi export deals reshape its global sales landscape.72 sources

SambaNova raises $350M, partners with Intel to challenge Nvidia in AI chipsPublished4 hours agoThe AI chip startup unveiled its fifth-generation processor and a multi-year Intel collaboration after acquisition talks between the two companies fell through.43 sources
Air Force begins weapons tests on new combat drones46 sources
Novo Nordisk reports 19.7% weight loss in triple agonist trial42 sources
Rival studies clash over fate of massive dying star WOH G6453 sources

Internal documents show Meta researchers sought to study addictive features in 2018Published12 hours agoNewly released files reveal Facebook employees proposed auditing features like autoplay and endless scroll for compulsive effects, but the study was never carried out.46 sources

Blue Owl Capital faces lawsuits, downgrades after halting fund redemptionsPublished9 minutes agoThe alternative asset manager's stock has dropped sharply as analysts cut targets and investors allege they were misled about liquidity risks.71 sources
Brookfield launches Radiant as AI infrastructure firm through Ori Industries merger35 sources
Fed's Cook warns AI could cause joblessness beyond monetary policy's reach113 sources
Bitcoin's worst month since 2022 pushes Strategy's losses past $9B65 sources

Lagarde calls Europe a 'sleeping giant' on AI adoptionPublished24 minutes agoThe ECB president said Europe can capitalize on AI by applying it across manufacturing and industry, even without leading in frontier models.77 sources

Dimon draws parallels to pre-2008 era amid private credit stressPublished34 minutes agoJPMorgan's CEO said he sees competitors "doing some dumb things" as AI fears and fund redemption shifts rattle the $3 trillion private credit market.114 sources
Oracle shares slide as Stargate AI project stalls53 sources
Treasury yields hit 3-month low as investors flee to bonds amid market turmoil79 sources
Citi says hedge funds sold dollar after tariff ruling51 sources

MetLife drops nearly 5% as Trump tariff hike rattles Wall StreetPublished49 minutes agoThe insurer's stock closed at its lowest level in months as financial stocks led a broad market selloff triggered by new 15% global tariffs.40 sources

AI bubble tops credit investor concerns for first time, BofA survey findsPublished50 minutes agoFear of an AI bubble doubled among investment-grade respondents to become their No. 1 worry, overtaking broader credit concerns.81 sources
Emerging market stocks hit new highs as post-tariff-ruling rally extends124 sources
Chinese yuan surges to 2.5-year high as markets reopen76 sources
Fed's Goolsbee warns against cutting rates based on AI productivity hopes64 sources

Stripe valued at $159B in new tender offer, up 70% in a yearPublished2 hours agoThe payments giant disclosed the valuation alongside its annual letter, which reported $1.9 trillion in total payment volume for 2025.67 sources

Stellantis set to report first annual loss on WednesdayPublished2 hours agoThe Jeep and Chrysler parent took a $26 billion write-down tied to its overambitious EV strategy under former CEO Carlos Tavares.65 sources
Novo Nordisk to cut Ozempic, Wegovy list prices by up to 50%93 sources
Oil prices near 7-month highs ahead of U.S.-Iran talks56 sources
Trump's new 10% global tariff takes effect amid AI-driven market turmoil60 sources

European stocks slide as AI disruption fears cross the AtlanticPublished3 hours agoBank stocks led European markets lower Tuesday, tracking a Wall Street selloff fueled by a viral AI doomsday report and new U.S. tariffs.66 sources
